title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-1.6 - Timekeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 124-1.6 - Timekeeping

State Regulations
(a) District
superintendents shall be exempt from recording their leave, accruals, and time
worked through the New York State Leave and Accrual Tracking System (LATS) if a
comparable system collecting the same data regarding leave, accruals, and time
worked exists at the local BOCES level. (b) The district superintendent or BOCES
shall provide the data collected through any such local leave and accrual
timekeeping system to the Department or other state entity, if requested, within ten business days. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
124-1.6

Adopted

New

York State Register February 26, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 08, eff. 2/26/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
